name: Sonic Racing
summary: The world's fastest hedgehog is back in SONIC RACING! Take control of one of 15 playable characters from the Sonic universe and compete in the ultimate multiplayer racing experience. COLLECT power-ups, SET traps and ATTACK competitors all while driving at high speed. Ready, Set, RACE!
info:
• 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 游玩人数: 1-4人
  • 发行日期: 2019年9月19日
